content:
I'm glad you're thinking about task management! As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal preferences or opinions, but I can suggest some popular task management apps that are highly rated by users:

1. Todoist: A popular and feature-rich app for creating and managing tasks, projects, and habits.
2. Trello: A visual task management tool that uses boards, lists, and cards to organize tasks and projects.
3. Asana: A comprehensive project management tool that helps teams and individuals track and manage tasks, projects, and workflows.
4. Wunderlist: A simple and intuitive task management app for creating to-do lists and setting reminders.
5. Any.do: A task management app that allows you to create and manage tasks, set reminders, and collaborate with others.

These are just a few examples, and there are many more options available, depending on your specific needs and preferences.

Regarding your coffee break with Sarah, if you're unsure about the day, you can always confirm with her or check your calendar to make sure you don't miss your catch-up session!
